snippet: With a few key ingredients, portions of yesterday’s meal can help produce a memorable new dish today.
abstract: Leftovers often get short shrift, but are a great source of inspiration that can pave the way to greater success and improvisation in the kitchen; keeping some key ingredients on hand can add flair to a leftover dish or help quickly forge a new one; recipe for greek-style dinner pie with leftover greens given.
lead_paragraph: With a few key ingredients, portions of yesterday’s meal can help produce a memorable new dish today.

headline.seo: Inventive Cooking, Beginning With Your Leftovers
